title: Baby's ashes confused with pet & moms charged with infant abuse
itunes:title: Baby's ashes confused with pet & moms charged with infant abuse
description:
A mom learns ashes given her after her infant daughter's death were the remains of a dog. Nancy Grace talks with attorney Wendy Russell Wiener, an expert in regulatory law regarding death care, about what a family can. A teen charged with killing her newborn and burning the infant is out on bond. Reporter Art Harris, forensics expert Joseph Scott Morgan and psychologist Caryn Stark discuss. DailyMail.com‘s Sean Walsh and psychologist Dr. Bethany Marshall join Nancy to talk about a woman who tried to flush her newborn down a hospital toilet before abandoning him in a trash can. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
